item.title: We are giving special attention to solve city issues: Gadwal Vijayalakshmi
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Hyderabad: GHMC Mayor Gadwal Vijayalakshmi on Monday said that special attention had been paid to the problems of the city and added that In order to find out the problems in various wards of the city and resolve them on the spot, the officials of the respective departments of the zonal units along with the concerned corporators would focus on the long-term issues in sanitation, storm water drainage in colonies and prepare proposals as required .

item.title: Honda Dio (2020-2024) On Road Price in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Dio (2020-2024) Running Cost
The Dio (2020-2024) has a running cost of Rs. 2.00 per kilometer and a monthly fuel cost of Rs. 3000, assuming a daily run of 50 kilometers and Petrol at Rs. 100 per liter.
